attributes.action: we should allow  Donald Trump from making a State Visit to the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details:
Think of what Trump has actually said. In his view members of the Muslim community are now so dangerous to non-Muslim members of the community that their presence can literally no longer be tolerated. 

We are scared but our government will not look into this.
attributes.background: Donald Trump should be allowed to enter the UK in his capacity as head of the US Government, and should  be invited to make an official State Visit because it would not cause embarrassment to Her Majesty the Queen.
